location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 18/17 B Series: King's Regulations under the Kuwait Order in Council'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation system in use starts at the front cover and continues through to the back cover. The sequence appears written in pencil, enclosed in a circle, in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio.

mods.abstract: Notice of King's Regulations under Article 83 of The KowaitOrder in Council, 1935: Special Police Officers' Regulations, dated Bahrein, 23 March 1948; and letter from the Commonwealth Relations Office, Downing Street, London to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, dated 18 March 1948, asking the Resident to sign, date, number and return a copy of the regulations.
